entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Greater Sudbury
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:39 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -26.4°C

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 31 with temperature rising to minus 25 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then periods of light snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31 with temperature rising to minus 25 by morning. Wind chill minus 40 this evening. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
